import Cookies from'js-cookie';import config from'../config';//console.log('Cookie Config : ', config.cookie);
export var get=function get(){var name=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'foodjets_new_merchant';if(config.cookie.hostname==='http://console.dev.foodjets.com'){name='dev_'+name;}return Cookies.getJSON(name);};export var set=function set(data){var name=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'foodjets_new_merchant';if(config.cookie.hostname==='http://console.dev.foodjets.com'){name='dev_'+name;}if(!!config.cookie.domain)Cookies.set(name,data,{domain:config.cookie.domain});else Cookies.set(name,data);};export var remove=function remove(){var name=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'foodjets_new_merchant';if(config.cookie.hostname==='http://console.dev.foodjets.com'){name='dev_'+name;}if(!!config.cookie.domain)Cookies.remove(name,{domain:config.cookie.domain});else Cookies.remove(name);};export var setCookie=function setCookie(data,name){Cookies.set(name,data);};export var setLifetimeCookie=function setLifetimeCookie(data,name){Cookies.set(name,data,{expires:365});};export var removeCookie=function removeCookie(name){Cookies.remove(name);};export var getCookie=function getCookie(name){return Cookies.getJSON(name);};
